statement.name: GetContracts
statement.sql:
SELECT l1.contract_number, l1.description as contract_purpose, l3.agency_id, l3.agency_name, l4.vendor_id, l4.legal_name as vendor_name, l1.minority_type_id, l1.original_agreement_id, l1.document_code_id, l2.document_code, ref_status.scntrc_status_name as contract_subvendor_status, SUM(COALESCE(l1.original_contract_amount,0)) AS original_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(l1.maximum_contract_amount,0)) AS current_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(l1.spending_amount,0)) AS spending_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(dollar_difference,0)) AS dollar_difference, AVG(percent_difference) AS percent_difference FROM aggregateon_mwbe_contracts_cumulative_spending l1 JOIN ref_document_code l2 ON l2.document_code_id = l1.document_code_id JOIN ref_agency l3 on l3.agency_id = l1.agency_id JOIN vendor l4 on l4.vendor_id = l1.vendor_id LEFT JOIN ref_subcontract_status ref_status on ref_status.scntrc_status = l1.scntrc_status
GROUP BY l1.type_of_year, l1.description,l1.contract_number, l1.original_agreement_id, l1.document_code_id,l2.document_code, l1.minority_type_id,l3.agency_id,l3.agency_name,l4.vendor_id,l4.legal_name,contract_subvendor_status
HAVING SUM(COALESCE(dollar_difference,0)) != 0

statement.name: GetCountContracts
statement.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT l1.contract_number FROM aggregateon_mwbe_contracts_cumulative_spending l1 JOIN ref_document_code l2 ON l2.document_code_id = l1.document_code_id
HAVING SUM(COALESCE(dollar_difference,0)) != 0

statement.name: GetContractsByAgencies
statement.sql:
SELECT a.type_of_year, e.agency_id, e.agency_name, SUM(COALESCE(a.original_contract_amount,0)) AS original_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(a.maximum_contract_amount,0)) AS current_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(a.spending_amount,0)) AS spending_amount_sum, COUNT(contract_number) AS total_contracts FROM aggregateon_mwbe_contracts_cumulative_spending a JOIN ref_document_code b ON a.document_code_id = b.document_code_id JOIN ref_agency c on c.agency_id = a.agency_id JOIN vendor d on d.vendor_id = a.vendor_id JOIN ref_agency e ON e.agency_id = a.agency_id
GROUP BY a.type_of_year,e.agency_id,e.agency_name

statement.name: GetContractsByAwardMethods
statement.sql:
SELECT e.award_method_id, e.award_method_name, SUM(COALESCE(a.original_contract_amount,0)) AS original_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(a.maximum_contract_amount,0)) AS current_amount_sum, SUM(COALESCE(a.spending_amount,0)) AS spending_amount_sum, COUNT(contract_number) AS total_contracts FROM aggregateon_mwbe_contracts_cumulative_spending a JOIN ref_document_code b ON a.document_code_id = b.document_code_id JOIN ref_agency c on c.agency_id = a.agency_id JOIN vendor d on d.vendor_id = a.vendor_id JOIN ref_award_method e ON e.award_method_id = a.award_method_id
GROUP BY e.award_method_id,e.award_method_name

minority_type_id,

GROUP BY v.vendor_id, v.legal_name
, minority_type_id

statement.name: GetContractsByIndustries

statement.name: GetContractsBySize

statement.name: GetContractsSubvendorStatusByPrime
statement.sql:
SELECT a.original_agreement_id, a.agency_id, a.vendor_id, b.sub_vendor_id, a.is_prime_or_sub, a.minority_type_id, rd.document_code, a.contract_number, a.description, a.agency_name, CASE WHEN a.vendor_name IS NULL THEN 'N/A' ELSE a.vendor_name END AS vendor_name, CASE WHEN b.vendor_name IS NULL THEN 'NOT PROVIDED' ELSE b.vendor_name END AS sub_vendor, c.aprv_sta_value as aprv_status_value FROM all_agreement_transactions a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.original_agreement_id, a.contract_number, a.vendor_name, a.vendor_id as sub_vendor_id,a.aprv_sta as aprv_sta_id FROM all_agreement_transactions a
'S' 'Y'
) b on b.contract_number = a.contract_number LEFT JOIN subcontract_approval_status c ON c.aprv_sta_id = COALESCE(b.aprv_sta_id,6) JOIN ref_document_code rd ON rd.document_code_id = a.document_code_id
'P'
2
ORDER BY c.sort_order,a.original_agreement_id

statement.name: GetContractsSubvendorReporting
statement.sql:
SELECT l3.agency_id, l3.agency_name, COUNT(DISTINCT l1.contract_number) as number_contracts, SUM(CASE WHEN ref_status.scntrc_status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS no_response_status, SUM(CASE WHEN ref_status.scntrc_status = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS reported_sub_count, SUM(CASE WHEN ref_status.scntrc_status = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS reported_no_sub_count, SUM(CASE WHEN ref_status.scntrc_status = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS not_required FROM aggregateon_mwbe_contracts_cumulative_spending l1 JOIN ref_subcontract_status ref_status on ref_status.scntrc_status = l1.scntrc_status JOIN ref_document_code l2 ON l2.document_code_id = l1.document_code_id JOIN ref_agency l3 on l3.agency_id = l1.agency_id JOIN vendor l4 on l4.vendor_id = l1.vendor_id
'A'
GROUP BY l3.agency_id, l3.agency_name

statement.name: GetPrimeContractSubVenReportingSubLevel
statement.sql:
SELECT l3.agency_id, l3.agency_name, COUNT(DISTINCT l1.contract_number) as number_contracts, SUM(CASE WHEN ref_status.scntrc_status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS no_response_status, SUM(CASE WHEN ref_status.scntrc_status = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS reported_sub_count, SUM(CASE WHEN ref_status.scntrc_status = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS reported_no_sub_count, SUM(CASE WHEN ref_status.scntrc_status = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS not_required FROM aggregateon_mwbe_contracts_cumulative_spending l1 JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT contract_number, prime_vendor_id FROM sub_agreement_snapshot
'Y'
) sd ON l1.contract_number = sd.contract_number AND l1.vendor_id = sd.prime_vendor_id JOIN ref_subcontract_status ref_status on ref_status.scntrc_status = l1.scntrc_status JOIN ref_document_code l2 ON l2.document_code_id = l1.document_code_id JOIN ref_agency l3 on l3.agency_id = l1.agency_id JOIN vendor l4 on l4.vendor_id = l1.vendor_id
'A'
GROUP BY l3.agency_id, l3.agency_name

statement.name: GetContractsSubvendorContractsByAgency
statement.sql:
SELECT ra.agency_name AS agency_name, ra.agency_id, COUNT(DISTINCT a.contract_number ) AS reported_contracts_with_subvendors, COUNT(sd.aprv_sta) AS no_of_subvendors_submitted, SUM(CASE WHEN aprv_sta=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS acco_reviewing, SUM(CASE WHEN aprv_sta=4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS acco_approved, SUM(CASE WHEN aprv_sta=2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS acco_rejected, SUM(CASE WHEN aprv_sta=5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS acco_cancelled FROM aggregateon_mwbe_contracts_cumulative_spending a LEFT JOIN (SELECT contract_number, aprv_sta FROM subcontract_details WHERE latest_flag='Y') sd ON a.contract_number=sd.contract_number LEFT JOIN ref_document_code c ON a.document_code_id=c.document_code_id LEFT JOIN ref_agency ra ON a.agency_id=ra.agency_id
'A'
2
GROUP BY ra.agency_name, ra.agency_id

2

statement.name: GetContractsByDepartments
statement.sql:
SELECT agency.agency_id AS agency_id, agency.agency_name AS agency_name, dept.department_id AS department_id, dept.department_name AS department_name, SUM(COALESCE(a.spending_amount,0)) AS spending_amount_sum, sum(a.total_contracts) AS total_contracts FROM aggregateon_mwbe_contracts_department a JOIN ref_document_code b ON b.document_code_id = a.document_code_id JOIN ref_agency agency ON agency.agency_id = a.agency_id JOIN ref_department dept ON dept.department_id = a.department_id
GROUP BY agency.agency_id,agency.agency_name,dept.department_id,dept.department_name
